data.title: Private College Preparatory School
data.meta_description: Located in Montverde, Florida, Montverde Academy is the best private college preparatory school for boarding and day students, Pre-K3 through grade 12..
data.text:
Academics

ITâ€™S WHO WE ARE! MVA has been ranked No. 1 for Most Diverse Private High School in Florida by Niche.com for three years in a row, and listed as the #14 Most Influential Private High School in the US by Academicinfluence.com. The Class of 2023 earned over $17 million in academic scholarships, had 42 Distinguished Scholars, and a 100 percent college acceptance rate.

Athletics

UNPARALLELED ATHLETICS!

Our athletics programs have earned notable distinctions that include 18 national championship titles and more than 60 student-athletes playing professionally. We offer 20 varsity sports programs and elite programs for boys basketball, boys soccer, tennis, golf, swim, and girls soccer. Montverde Academy offers a strong, competitive athletic program and belongs to the Florida High School Athletic Association (FHSAA). Athletic programs at Montverde Academy have achieved considerable local, regional, and national success.

Fine Arts

SHINE LIKE A STAR!

Montverde Academy offers an award-winning fine arts program and comprehensive college preparatory curriculum to young artists who represent a diverse, and gifted student body. Talented student artists focus on their passion for music, theatre, dance, and the arts in an immersive and intensive educational experience.

Lower School

At the Lower School level, we teach respect and understanding of various differences in culture, religion, ethnicity, and race. Being part of a school community where students come from all over the globe, our Lower School students have unique opportunities to learn about the world around us.

Middle School

The academic component of what we do in Middle School is very important, but it is not the only area of student development we emphasize. We focus on developing the complete child in multiple areas of interest with varied club offerings including sports, academic teams, Robotics, music, theatre, volunteerism, and more.

Upper School

Daily life in the Upper School will reveal students and staff who are driven by a shared commitment both to excellence and to each other, with the relationships in our school community supporting students in their achievement at high levels in academics, athletics, and the arts.
